Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a pair in vine tangles and bamboo inside humid mata atlantica forest. On-mic bird about 5m up in vines in tree crotch. I should note that the bird's namesake was standing nearby. img:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/8454050202/bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
